Desc.entry: A not-for-profit organisation which is one of the most successful and secure health insurers in the UK. Westfield Health cash plans give money back towards healthcare bills and are an easy way to help budget for essential health costs. Westfield make substantial donations to the NHS and medically related charities every year.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4.30pm (except Christmas Eve and public holidays)

category.entry: HEALTH - FUNDRAISING, RESEARCH AND VOLUNTARY SUPPORT
